dr.evomodel.treelikelihood
Class AdvancedTreeLikelihood

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel
      dr.inference.model.AbstractModelLikelihood
          dr.evomodel.treelikelihood.AbstractTreeLikelihood
              dr.evomodel.treelikelihood.AdvancedTreeLikelihood
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loggable, Likelihood, Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, Reportable, java.io.Serializable
public class AdvancedTreeLikelihood
extends AbstractTreeLikelihood

AdvancedTreeLikelihood - implements a Likelihood Function for sequences on a tree. This one has some advanced models such as multiple site models for different clades. This only makes sense if those clades are being constrained to remain monophyletic.

Version:
$Id: AdvancedTreeLikelihood.java,v 1.11 2006/01/10 16:48:27 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut
See Also:

handleVariableChangedEvent

protected final void handleVariableChangedEvent(Variable variable,
                                                int index,
                                                Variable.ChangeType type)
Description copied from class: AbstractModel
This method is called whenever a parameter is changed.

It is strongly recommended that the model component sets a "dirty" flag and does no further calculations. Recalculation is typically done when the model component is asked for some information that requires them. This mechanism is 'lazy' so that this method can be safely called multiple times with minimal computational cost.

Overrides:
handleVariableChangedEvent in class AbstractTreeLikelihood
